content: this pattern is available for free on my site or you can purchase the easy to print pdf here shawls are comforting beautiful and versatile - and this one is buttery soft as well introducing the brown butter shawl the brown butter shawl is made with red heart soft essentials stripes - it s butter soft and just so yummy soft essentials is a bulky weight yarn which means that this shawl works up in just a few evenings or one long weekend and this stitch pattern is both beginner-friendly and always changing - watch how you turn the corner it might surprise you here and there video tutorial and charts included
